story.title: Our Story
story.p1: It all started in the heart of the mountains, where a shared love for adventure and the Great Outdoors brought us together. What began as a simple coffee chat soon turned into a lifetime of shared sunsets and mountain peaks.
story.p2: From our first hike to the countless memories built since, every step has led us to this moment. We've grown together, supported each other's dreams, and discovered that life's greatest adventures are the ones you take hand in hand.
story.quote: Home isn't a place, it's a person. And I've finally found my way home.

location.title: The Location
location.description: Our wedding will take place in the Trenčianska Teplá. Both the ceremony and reception are centrally located, making it easy to navigate between venues.
location.parking: Parking is available directly at the ATRIUM reception venue. Additionally, both arranged accommodations offer their own private parking spaces.
location.quote: We can't wait to see you there!

accommodation.title: Where to Stay
accommodation.subtitle: We've curated some of our favorite spots nearby

hotels.name: Grand Hotel River Park
hotels.description: A luxury option overlooking the Danube river, located near the wedding venues.

hotels.name: Sheraton Bratislava Hotel
hotels.description: Modern comfort in the heart of the Eurovea urban center.

hotels.name: Botel Dunajský Pivovar
hotels.description: A unique experience staying on a boat with a brewery on board.

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.p1: The most important thing to us is that you can join us for our wedding. Your presence is the greatest gift we could ask for.
gifts.p2: However, if you wish to honor us with a gift, a contribution towards our honeymoon adventures or our future home together would be warmly appreciated.

footer.thanks: Thank you for being part of our story. We can't wait to celebrate this special day with all of our favorite people.
footer.madeWith: Made with love for our special day
